thread.title: Stars to embrace bright colors on Oscar red carpet - stylist

title: Stars to embrace bright colors on Oscar red carpet - stylist
text:
Stars to embrace bright colors on Oscar red carpet - stylist 6:38pm EST - 01:05 
On Sunday's Oscar red carpet, expect bright colors and sequined sparkle, says stylist Dustin Zuber. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
